description: Isidore Nadas connects with fellow graffiti artist Andras Molnar to plan their next project, but Isidore's lover George Vidanov is feeling neglected.  Isidore can't deny that he's had other things on his mind, but they can certainly make up for lost time-and soon the lovers are intertwined in erotic play.  Andras interrupts, and Isidore invites him to join in for a steamy threesome which pushes these studs into a powerful triple eruption of satisfactions.(Scene A/Scene B)
title: Hungarian Graffiti, Scene #02
